TopicTitle: Is there a way to lock antennas in the open position?

Articles.Content: This is more of an aesthetic thing in my part, but it's annoying to watch my antennas and dishes constantly folding and unfolding while I'm transmitting multiple experiments. Is there a way to lock them in the open position once they've been deployed, but allow them to still transmit data?
You can open them and lock them, but only until the next time you transmit, and then it will still close itself once finished.

You can open them and lock them, but only until the next time you transmit, and then it will still close itself once finished.

Yea that's what I was hoping to bypass. It's not a huge deal, it would just be nice to have them locked open permanently.

If you do all experiments and store them (either "Keep Data" or put them in a science lab), you can then right click on the antenna and transmit science from that; it'll transmit each item of science one by one until it's done, then close, rather than opening and closing for each experiment.

It's half a solution.
